GPO.Name: HAD-Auto-Update-S1-Thu-0h-Srv
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Scheduling of updates and reboot after 15min of the machine in W1 on Wednesday at 00:00 AM

GPO.Name: HAD-Auto-Update-S1-Thu-1h-Srv
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Scheduling of updates and reboot after 15min of the machine in W1 on Wednesday at 01:00 AM

GPO.Name: HAD-Auto-Update-S3-Thu-0h-Srv
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Scheduling of updates and reboot after 15min of the machine in W3 on Wednesday at 00:00 AM

GPO.Name: HAD-Auto-Update-S3-Thu-1h-Srv
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Scheduling of updates and reboot after 15min of the machine in W3 on Wednesday at 01:00 AM

GPO.Name: HAD-Auto-Update-S4-Thu-0h-Srv
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Scheduling of updates and reboot after 15min of the machine in W4 on Wednesday at 00:00 AM

GPO.Name: HAD-Auto-Update-S4-Thu-1h-Srv
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Scheduling of updates and reboot after 15min of the machine in W4 on Wednesday at 01:00 AM

GPO.Name: HAD-Auto-Update-Win10-11
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Setting up Windows Update on Windows 10/11 machines according to the recommendations

GPO.Name: HAD-Auto-Update-Win7-8
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Setting up Windows Update on Windows 7/8 machines according to the recommendations

GPO.Name: HAD-BitLocker-TPMOnly-Enabled-Win10-11
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enable BitLocker encryption with Trusted Platform Module.

GPO.Name: HAD-BitLocker-PIN-Enabled-Win10-11
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enable BitLocker encryption with Trusted Platform Module. 6-digit PIN code required.

GPO.Name: HAD-BitLocker-USB-Win10-11
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enable BitLocker encryption for USB drives with a password.

GPO.Name: HAD-BloodHound-Mitigation
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disable Net Session enumeration - Bloodhound / NetCease.

GPO.Name: HAD-Camera-on-lockon-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Blocks the camera on the lock screen.

GPO.Name: HAD-DCLocaltor-Configuration
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Prevents the DC from generating its DNS entries in -tcp-msdsc.

GPO.Name: HAD-DistributedFileSystem-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disable the Windows DFS Namespace service.

GPO.Name: HAD-FIPS-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Forces the use of the FIPS algorithm where possible.

GPO.Name: HAD-Firewall-Audit-Only
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Setup Microsoft Firewall in audit mode (allow all, log everything).

GPO.Name: HAD-Firewall-Block-Inbound
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Setup Microsoft Firewall in active mode in addition to system local rules.

GPO.Name: HAD-GPO-Refresh-Cycle
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Set the GPO refresh rate to 15 minutes.

GPO.Name: HAD-IPv6-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disables IPv6.

GPO.Name: HAD-Kerberos-AES-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Set the encryption types that Kerberos is allowed to use.

GPO.Name: HAD-LAPS-Configuration
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Configuration of the LAPS utility.

GPO.Name: HAD-LAPS-X64-Deployment
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Deployment of the LAPS utility for 64bit systems.

GPO.Name: HAD-LAPS-X86-Deployment
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Deployment of the LAPS utility for 32bit systems.

GPO.Name: HAD-LDAP-Audit-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enable event logs for the LDAP protocol.

GPO.Name: HAD-LDAP-CBT-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enforces validation of Channel Binding Tokens (CBT) received in LDAP bind requests.

GPO.Name: HAD-LDAP-Client-Signing-Not-Required
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Does not require a signature for LDAP communications with a client.

GPO.Name: HAD-LDAP-Client-Signing-Required
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Requires signing for LDAP communications with a client.

GPO.Name: HAD-LDAP-Server-Signing-Required
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Requires signing for LDAP communications with a server.

GPO.Name: HAD-LDAP-Audit-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Configure default search provider.

GPO.Name: HAD-LLMNR-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disables Link-local Multicast Name Resolution (LLMNR).

GPO.Name: HAD-LMHASH-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disables LMHASH.

GPO.Name: HAD-NTLM-Audit-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enable NTLM audit on Domain Controller.

GPO.Name: HAD-NTLM1-LMx-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Forces the use of NTLMv2 response. LM and NTLMv1 responses are refused.

GPO.Name: HAD-NTLMv2-128bits-Required
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Configure NTLMv2 to use 128-bit encryption.

GPO.Name: HAD-LocalAdmins-Pam-T0
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Add the local administration AD group to the corresponding PAW's integrated administrator group

GPO.Name: HAD-LocalAdmins-Pam-T1
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Add the local administration AD group to the corresponding T0 PAW's integrated administrator group

GPO.Name: HAD-LocalAdmins-Pam-T1L
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Add the local administration AD group to the corresponding T12L PAW's integrated administrator group

GPO.Name: HAD-LocalAdmins-Pam-T2
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Add the local administration AD group to the corresponding T0 PAW's integrated administrator group

GPO.Name: HAD-LocalAdmins-Pam-T2L
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Add the local administration AD group to the corresponding T12L PAW's integrated administrator group

GPO.Name: HAD-LocalAdmins-T0-Srv
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Add the local administration AD group to the corresponding T0 system's integrated administrator group

GPO.Name: HAD-LocalAdmins-T0-Wks
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Add the local administration AD group to the corresponding T0 system's integrated administrator group

GPO.Name: HAD-LocalAdmins-T1
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Add the local administration AD group to the corresponding T1 system's integrated administrator group

GPO.Name: HAD-LocalAdmins-T1L
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Add the local administration AD group to the corresponding legacy server (T1L) system's integrated administrator group

GPO.Name: HAD-LocalAdmins-T2
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Add the local administration AD group to the corresponding T2 system's integrated administrator group

GPO.Name: HAD-LocalAdmins-T2L
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Add the local administration AD group to the corresponding legacy workstation (T2L) system's integrated administrator group

GPO.Name: HAD-Local-Accounts-Config
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enable and rename the local administrator account. Disable and rename the local guest account.

GPO.Name: HAD-LoginRestrictions-Pam-T0
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Restrict login to members of L-S-T0-PAM on administration computers (i.e. PAW, Bastion, Management Severs, ...)

GPO.Name: HAD-LoginRestrictions-Pam-T1
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Restrict login to members of L-S-T1-PAM on administration computers (i.e. PAW, Bastion, Management Severs, ...)

GPO.Name: HAD-LoginRestrictions-Pam-T1L
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Restrict login to members of L-S-T1L-PAM on administration computers (i.e. PAW, Bastion, Management Severs, ...)

GPO.Name: HAD-LoginRestrictions-Pam-T2
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Restrict login to members of L-S-T2-PAM on administration computers (i.e. PAW, Bastion, Management Severs, ...)

GPO.Name: HAD-LoginRestrictions-Pam-T2L
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Restrict login to members of L-S-T2L-PAM on administration computers (i.e. PAW, Bastion, Management Severs, ...)

GPO.Name: HAD-LoginRestrictions-T0
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Blocks connections to tier 0 machines from other tier accounts

GPO.Name: HAD-LoginRestrictions-T1
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Blocks connections to tier 1 machines from other tier accounts

GPO.Name: HAD-LoginRestrictions-T1L
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Blocks connections to tier legacy servers from other tier accounts

GPO.Name: HAD-LoginRestrictions-T2
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Blocks connections to tier 2 machines from other tier accounts

GPO.Name: HAD-LoginRestrictions-T2L
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Blocks connections to tier legacy workstations from other tier accounts

GPO.Name: HAD-Logon-Cache-0
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," No login credentials cached from servers.

GPO.Name: HAD-Logon-Cache-2
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Keeps two login credentials cached from servers.

GPO.Name: HAD-MSLive-Accounts-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Blocks the use of personal Microsoft accounts.

GPO.Name: HAD-NBT-NS-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disables DNS Fallback functionality: NBT-NS.

GPO.Name: HAD-PageFile-Shutdown-Cleared
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Empty the pagefile.sys on each shutdown.

GPO.Name: HAD-Print-Spooler-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disables the print spooler service on windows system.

GPO.Name: HAD-Remote-Assistance-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disable Windows remote assistance.

GPO.Name: HAD-Screenlock-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Lock inactive sessions after 20 minutes.

GPO.Name: HAD-Secure-NetLogon
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Secure Netlogon service.

GPO.Name: HAD-Svc-Browser-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disable the Windows Browser service.

GPO.Name: HAD-Svc-Server-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disables Lanman Server Service.

GPO.Name: HAD-UAC-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enables UAC's approval mode for all administrators.

GPO.Name: HAD-WDigest-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disables WDigest protocol.

GPO.Name: HAD-Windows-Defender-Config
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Configures Windows Defender.

GPO.Name: HAD-WinRM-Basic-Digest-Auth-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disallows basic, unencrypted authentication for WinRM use.

GPO.Name: HAD-WebProxyAutoDiscovery-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disable Web Proxy Auto-Discovery Protocol.

GPO.Name: HAD-autoplay-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disable autoplay for usb, dvd, ....

GPO.Name: HAD-CredentialManager-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disable autoplay for usb, dvd, ....

GPO.Name: HAD-Security-Logs
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Configures security logs based on ANSSI recommendations.

GPO.Name: HAD-PowerShell-Logs
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enable Logs for PowerShell and secure event log.

GPO.Name: HAD-TS-Local-admins-groups
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Import the HADLocalAdmins module and create the associated scheduled task.

GPO.Name: HAD-TS-Remote-Desktop-Users
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Manage Remote Desktop Users groups for each computers.

GPO.Name: HAD-TS-Clear-Protected-groups
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Import the Group flushing script and create the associated scheduled task.

GPO.Name: HAD-TS-Reset-Computer-Sddl
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Reset the sddl and owner of new computer objects through a schedule task.

GPO.Name: HAD-TS-AdminSDholder-check
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Setup a Task Scheduled on the PDC to review all accounts with a non-null AdminCount' value and reset them accordingly.

GPO.Name: HAD-RDP-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disables the RDP service and prohibits RDP connections

GPO.Name: HAD-RDP-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enable the RDP service, set the firewall and allow RDP connections

GPO.Name: HAD-RDP-NLA-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enable NLA for RDP connections.

GPO.Name: HAD-Smart-Card-Required
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Force the use of Windows Hello for smartcards.

GPO.Name: HAD-SMB-Signing-Configuration
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Configure SMB signing for clients.

GPO.Name: HAD-SMB1-Audit-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Creates a scheduled task to audit SMBv1.

GPO.Name: HAD-SMB1-Client-Only-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enables SMBv1 only for clients.

GPO.Name: HAD-SMB1-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disables SMBv1.

GPO.Name: HAD-SMB1-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enables SMBv1.

GPO.Name: HAD-SMB1-Server-Only-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enables SMBv1 only for servers.

GPO.Name: HAD-UNC-Hardened-Path
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enables SMBv1 only for servers.

GPO.Name: HAD-SSL2-SSL3-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disables SSLv2 and SSLv3 on Windows systems.

GPO.Name: HAD-SSL2-SSL3-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enables SSLv2 and SSLv3 on Windows systems.

GPO.Name: HAD-TLS-1_0-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Configure default search provider.

GPO.Name: HAD-TLS-1_0-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Configure default search provider.

GPO.Name: HAD-TLS-1_1-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Configure default search provider.

GPO.Name: HAD-TLS-1_1-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Configure default search provider.

GPO.Name: HAD-TLS-1_2-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Configure default search provider.

GPO.Name: HAD-TLS-1_2-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Configure default search provider.

GPO.Name: HAD-TLS-1_3-Disabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Disable TLS 1.3 on target system.

GPO.Name: HAD-TLS-1_3-Enabled
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Enable TLS 1.3 on target system.

GPO.Name: HAD-DC-Allow-Computer-Account-ReUse
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Allow computer domain join to specific delegation group.

GPO.Name: HAD-QwantSearch
GPO.Description: --- Harden AD --- " ," Configure default search provider.

Group.name: %t0-managers%
Group.Description: Members of this group can see and manage all the Active Directory objects

Group.name: %t0-operators%
Group.Description: Members of this group can operate on Tier 0 resources

Group.name: %t1-managers%
Group.Description: Members of this group can manage all Tier 1 ressources, including T1 admin users and groups

Group.name: %t1-administrators%
Group.Description: Members of this group can manage all Tier 1 resources, excluding T1 admin users and groups

Group.name: %t1-operators%
Group.Description: Members of this group can operate on Tier 1 resources (login)

Group.name: %t2-managers%
Group.Description: Members of this group can manage all Tier 2 ressources, including T1 admin users and groups

Group.name: %t2-administrators%
Group.Description: Members of this group can manage all Tier 2 ressources, excluding T1 admin users and groups

Group.name: %t2-operators%
Group.Description: Members of this group can operate on Tier 2 resources (login)

Group.name: %t1l-operators%
Group.Description: Members of this group can operate on Tier Legacy server resources (login)

Group.name: %t2l-operators%
Group.Description: Members of this group can operate on Tier Legacy resources (login)

Group.name: %t0-global%
Group.Description: Members of this group are part of Tier 0 administrative assets

Group.name: %t1-global%
Group.Description: Members of this group are part of Tier 1 administrative assets

Group.name: %t2-global%
Group.Description: Members of this group are part of Tier 2 administrative assets

Group.name: %t1l-global%
Group.Description: Members of this group are part of Legacy servers' administrative assets

Group.name: %t2l-global%
Group.Description: Members of this group are part of Legacy servers' administrative assets

Group.name: %pamT0-logon%
Group.Description: Members of this group will be able to connect to the Tier 0 PAM systems (Privileged Administration Management)

Group.name: %pamT1-logon%
Group.Description: Members of this group will be able to connect to the Tier 1 PAM systems (Privileged Administration Management)

Group.name: %pamL1-logon%
Group.Description: Members of this group will be able to connect to the Tier 1 Legacy PAM systems (Privileged Administration Management)

Group.name: %pamT2-logon%
Group.Description: Members of this group will be able to connect to the Tier 2 PAM systems (Privileged Administration Management)

Group.name: %pamL2-logon%
Group.Description: Members of this group will be able to connect to the Tier 2 Legacy PAM systems (Privileged Administration Management)

Group.name: %t0-localAdmin-servers%
Group.Description: Members of this group will become member of the builtin\administrators group

Group.name: %t1-localAdmin-servers%
Group.Description: Members of this group will become member of the builtin\administrators group

Group.name: %t1l-localAdmin-servers%
Group.Description: Members of this group will become member of the builtin\administrators group

Group.name: %t0-localAdmin-workstations%
Group.Description: Members of this group will become member of the builtin\administrators group

Group.name: %t2-localAdmin-workstations%
Group.Description: Members of this group will become member of the builtin\administrators group

Group.name: %t2l-localAdmin-workstations%
Group.Description: Members of this group will become member of the builtin\administrators group

Group.name: %T1-DLG-CreateDeleteGroup-ADM%
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete groups within Tier 1 _Administration OU

Group.name: %T2-DLG-CreateDeleteGroup-ADM%
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete groups within Tier 1 _Administration OU

Group.name: %T1-DLG-CreateDeleteUser-ADM%
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete users within Tier 1 administration OU

Group.name: %T2-DLG-CreateDeleteUser-ADM%
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete users within Tier 1 administration OU

Group.name: %T1-DLG-CreateDeleteGroup%
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete groups within productions OUs (Tier 1 and 2)

Group.name: %T2-DLG-ManageMbrshipGroup%
Group.Description: Members of this group can add and remove members of tier 1 groups within productions OUs

Group.name: %T1-DLG-CreateDeleteUser%
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete users within productions OUs (Tier 1 and 2)

Group.name: %T2-DLG-CreateDeleteUser%
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete users within productions OUs (Tier 1 and 2)

Group.name: %T1-DLG-CreateDeleteComputer%
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete computers within productions OUs (Tier 1 and 2)

Group.name: %T2-DLG-CreateDeleteComputer%
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete computers within productions OUs (Tier 1 and 2)

Group.name: %T2-DLG-CreateDeleteContact%
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete contact within productions OUs (Tier 1 and 2)

Group.name: %T1-LAPS-PasswordReader%
Group.Description: Members of this group will be able to read LAPS password for workstations

Group.name: %T2-LAPS-PasswordReader%
Group.Description: Members of this group will be able to read LAPS password for workstations

Group.name: %T1-LAPS-PasswordReset%
Group.Description: Members of this group will be able to reset LAPS password for workstations

Group.name: %T2-LAPS-PasswordReset%
Group.Description: Members of this group will be able to reset LAPS password for workstations

Group.name: %T2-DLG-ExchCreateDeleteContact%
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete contact within Exchange OU

Group.name: %T2-DLG-ExchCreateDeleteSharedMbx%
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete User within Exchange OU

Group.name: %T2-DLG-ExchCreateDeleteDistributionGrp%
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete Group within Exchange OU

Group.name: %T2-DLG-ExchCreateDeleteResources%
Group.Description: Members of this group can create, update and delete User within Exchange OU

Group.name: %T0-DLG-CptrDomJoin%
Group.Description: Members of this group can join a system to the Tier 0 OU

Group.name: %T1-DLG-CptrDomJoin%
Group.Description: Members of this group can join a system to the Tier 1 OU

Group.name: %T2-DLG-CptrDomJoin%
Group.Description: Members of this group can join a system to the Tier 2 OU

Settings.Sequence:
Set-hADconfigurationFiles
No Copying configuration files to `(\\%Domaindns%\SYSVOL\%domaindns%\HardenAD`
Set-ADFunctionalLevel Domain Last No Upgrade `(DomainFunctionalLevel`
Set-ADFunctionalLevel Forest Last No Upgrade `(ForestFunctionalLevel`
Set-msDSMachineAccountQuota 0 No set `(msDSMachineAccountQuota` to `(0` to restrict domain junction
Set-ADRecycleBin
No activate the `(AD Recycle Bin` optional feature
Set-SiteLinkNotify
No set `(notify` on every `(Site Links
Set-GpoCentralStore
No set `(GPO Central Store` and `(update adm and admx` files
Set-NetLogonContent
No update `(\\%Domaindns%\netlogon` share with new scripts and files` files
Set-TreeOU HardenAD_ADMIN No set `(Administration` organizational unit
Set-TreeOU HardenAD_PROD-T0 No set `(Tier 0` organizational unit
Set-TreeOU HardenAD_PROD-T1and2 No set `(Tier 1 and Tier 2 combo` organizational unit
Set-TreeOU HardenAD_PROD-LEGACY No set `(Tier Legacy` organizational unit
-->
Set-DefaultObjectLocation User OU=%OU-PRD-T12-Provisioning-USER%,OU=%OU-PRD-T12-Provisioning%,OU=%OU-PRD-T12%,RootDN No set `(user objects` default location
Set-DefaultObjectLocation Computer OU=%OU-PRD-T12-Provisioning-CPTR%,OU=%OU-PRD-T12-Provisioning%,OU=%OU-PRD-T12%,RootDN No set `(computer objects` default location
New-AdministrationAccounts H4rd3n@D!! No create `(administration accounts` used by the tier model
New-AdministrationGroups
No create `(administration groups` used by the tier model
Push-DelegationModel
No Enforce `(Delegation ACEs` used by the tier model
Set-GptTmplSID {3B6DC475-6822-49C1-B47A-4199DF4FE1E6} No Prepare `(GptTmpl.inf` before the GPO importation of '`(HAD-DC-Allow-Computer-Account-ReUse`'
Import-WmiFilters
No Import `(WMI filter` to the domain
New-GpoObject
No Import or update `(group policy objects` to the domain and link them
Install-Laps ForceDcIsSchemaOwner No Update `(AD Schema` for `[LAPS` and add `(PShell add-on`
Set-LapsPermissions CUSTOM No Set-up `(LAPS` permissions on the target domain
Set-LapsScripts NETLOGON\LAPS No Update `(LAPS Scripts` to match with the domain name
Reset-GroupMembership
No Update `(groups' memberships` to match the `[trusted list`
